'''Unscrupulous Dealings''' is a [[Random Event]] World Quest that can occur while exploring the world.

==Steps==
#Defeat the [[Fatui]] and [[the Eremites]]

==Enemies==
===Chinvat Ravine and Gandha Hill===
{{Enemy List|
Eremite Crossbow;
Eremite Linebreaker;
Eremite Sword-Dancer;
Fatui Skirmisher - Anemoboxer Vanguard;
Fatui Skirmisher - Pyroslinger Bracer;
Shaggy Sumpter Beast}}

===Hypostyle Desert===
{{Enemy List|
Eremite Axe Vanguard;
Eremite Crossbow;
Eremite Ravenbeak Halberdier;
Fatui Skirmisher - Cryogunner Legionnaire;
Fatui Skirmisher - Electrohammer Vanguard * 2;
Desert Sumpter Beast}}

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
;(Upon triggering the quest)
:'''Paimon:''' Hey! It's the Fatui and the Eremites. Paimon wonders what they're talking about... But whatever it is, they look super suspicious!
:'''Paimon:''' Ohh, they must be doing some under-the-table deal! Let's stop them!
{{Dialogue end}}
